dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: South America, Andes, 2015
It began with a vision.
Everything was just fine up to that point.
Your llama herd used to pass the time spending hours upon hours grazing the fresh grass atop the Andes.
But then it just had to happen, didn't it?
The Incan gods called down to you, declaring that the herd was in danger.
In their brief moment of revelation, they didn't say how exactly, but that's not what matters at this point.
They urged that the only way to save the herd was to find the Place of Divination.
This is where your story begins.
You head East, though you don't know where that will lead.
East just seems right for some reason.
Would you like to see the instructions?

dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: HOW TO PLAY
Keep your herd healthy by balancing your rations and speed.
Move your cursor to the bottom of the screen to bring up the Llama herd's resource manager.
Control the food consumption using the right half of the pie menu.
Control the travel speed using the left half of the pie menu.
Events will appear at random and may effect the herd's statistics.
Would you like to see hints?

dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: Rations: eat enough to keep your health up but don't eat so fast that you run out of food before you reach each destination.
Speed: moving too fast will cause your health to drop faster but moving too slow will slow down your progress.
Remember, food is more import to your health than speed!

dialogue.speaker: Speaker 1
text: The journey begins!
